title: Snek stache your vitals and adventure kit in new collection of bike bags
content:
Snek Cycling have released a new line bike bags and super neat storage solutions, helping to get the weight off your back and onto the bike. There are options here that will support big days in the saddle, as well as complement more ambitious bike packing setups; from the Stache Handlebar Bags, to the Vital [â€¦]

The post Snek stache your vitals and adventure kit in new collection of bike bags appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
